children.subject: Peer advising will be closed the week of March 25 - 29 for spring break. Have a restful and safe spring break everyone!

history.content:
Meet with a CS peer advisor for drop-in advising. No appointment necessary! If you have a question about the Computer Science major consider speaking with a CS peer advisor. Learn more about our peer advisors by visiting our CS major advising webpage.

Location

Soda 3rd floor Alcove (next to Soda 349)

Schedule

Mondays:  10:00 AM - 12:00 PM and 3:00 PM - 4:30 PM
Tuesdays:  11:00 AM - 1:00 PM
Wednesdays:  12:00 PM - 2:00 PM and 3:00 PM - 4:30 PM
Thursdays:  1:00 PM - 4:30 PM
Fridays: 10:00 AM - 2:00 PM
